tool_description:
Translate word to word only one language to other
Text translate from one language to other language from given list of languages
Supports multilanguage at a time
name: Word translation word to word
title: Word translation word to word

api_list.name: Translate word to word
api_list.description:
Translate word to word from given list of languages to target language.
Either of from or to language must include English
